name: potassium chloride production | potassium chloride | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/8138/documentation

This dataset is a weighted average from the respective regional datasets.;This dataset represents the production of 1 kg of potassium chloride, with 60% K2O. Potassium chloride (formula KCl), also known as muriate of potash, is an odorless salt that has a white or colorless vitreous crystal appearanceis. Izt is mostly used as potassium (K) fertiliser that can also be a component in multi-nutrient fertilisers. Potassium chloride is produced by shaft mining and beneficiation. The modelled process includes the mining of potash salt. The incoming waste from the production is treated as inert material on a landfill site. Potassium chloride is produced in a wide variety of crystal sizes, according to the potash ore and process used. Different applications demand various particle-size distributions obtained by screening.;Potassium chloride is mainly used as a fertiliser, and is also used in medicine, in scientific applications, and in food processing, where it is known as E number additive E508.;The main data source for this dataset is Fertilizers Europe (2014), complemented by Althaus et al (2007).;References:;Fertilizers Europe (2014): Average Emissions Year 2011. Fertilizers Europe Environmental report (internal).;Fertilizers Europe (2016): Average Emissions Year 2014. Fertilizers Europe Environmental report (internal). Used for updated energy and GHG emission in Carbon Footprint Calculator;Althaus H.-J., Chudacoff M., Hischier R., Jungbluth N., Osses M. and Primas A. (2007) Life Cycle Inventories of Chemicals. ecoinvent report No. 8, v2.0. EMPA Dübendorf, Swiss Centre for Life Cycle Inventories, Dübendorf, CH.

The activity starts from potash extraction at the mine.

This activites ends with the production of 1 kg of potassium chloride.
category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2012:Manufacture of fertilizers and nitrogen compounds

processDocumentation.timeDescription: Primary data were collected on fertiliser production for the year 2011. These data were based on annual average data for the year 2011.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: This dataset is a weighted average built from the following geographies: CA-SK, RER.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Average techlogy from the regional counterparts as given in the geography comment.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription:
This dataset was built as a weighted average of regional datasets of the same activityName.  Weights are based on production volumes.
CA-SK: production volume = 9.5e+09 kg/year, weight = 0.6493
RER: production volume = 5.13e+09 kg/year, weight = 0.3507
